entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0127.9592] The statement 9952151 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets includes the concept us-gaap:InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssociatesAndJointVentures in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called us-gaap:StatementTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions us-gaap:LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountByClassAxis, us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis. The statement presentation group 9952151 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets includes a presentation concept called us-gaap:InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssociatesAndJointVentures. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table us-gaap:StatementTable:
us-gaap:InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssociatesAndJointVentures = 124,000,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table us-gaap:StatementTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
Total Element : us-gaap:InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssociatesAndJointVentures Total period : 2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:RelatedPartyTransactionsByRelatedPartyAxis=sun:J.C.NolanJointVentureMember
Rule Element Id:9592 Rule version: 26.0.9 - https://xbrl.fasb.org/us-gaap/2024/elts/us-gaap-2024.xsd 4275
